price: 193. Mpe bobundisa bango kino komekama ekosila, mpo ete lingomba ezala bobele ya Allah, kasi soki batiki, botika kobunda, longola sé babubi soki babundisi.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُوهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتۡنَةٞ وَيَكُونَ ٱلدِّينُ لِلَّهِۖ فَإِنِ ٱنتَهَوۡاْ فَلَا عُدۡوَٰنَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqātilūhum ḥattā lā takūna fit'natun wayakūna al-dīnu lillahi fa-ini intahaw falā ʿud'wāna illā ʿalā al-ẓālimīna
